message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $18,000.  I believe it's worth every penny, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider a price closer to $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $15,000 is still a bit more than I was hoping to spend.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $12,500?
